2022-02-01.name: Zhen Dao Ge: Chen Shi Xing
2022-02-01.desc:
The story tells the story of Luo Tong, the young leader of Linqing Cao Bang, who is framed by his enemies for the murder of his father during a cargo shipment, and is then hunted by the government and martial artists.

source: bgm.tv/Deepl.com

2022-02-04.name: Shika no Ou: Yuna to Yakusoku no Tabi
2022-02-04.desc:
* Based on a fantasy novel series written by Uehashi Nahoko.

In the years following a vicious war, the Empire of Zol now controls the land and citizens of rival Aquafa – except for Aquafa's Fire Horse Territory, where wild dogs that once carried the deadly Black Wolf Fever continue to roam free. When a pack of dogs race through a Zol-controlled mine, Van, an enslaved former soldier, and a young girl named Yuna are both bitten, but manage to escape as the sole survivors of the attack. Finally free, Van and Yuna seek out a simple, peaceful existence in the countryside. But as the deadly disease once again runs rampant, they find themselves at the crossroads of a struggle much larger than any one nation.

Source: GKIDS

2022-02-06.name: Bakugan: Evolutions
2022-02-06.desc: Note: Its broadcast started in Canada on Teletoon on 06.02.2022 and in Japan on streaming platforms in April 2022.

2022-02-06.name: Shenmue the Animation
2022-02-06.desc:
* Based on the video game series of the same name by Sega.

After he witnesses his father's murder at the family dojo, Hazuki Ryou dedicates his life to finding the man responsible—a mission that takes him from the streets of Yokosuka, Japan to the sprawling metropolis of Hong Kong, and beyond. Soon he will learn that larger, mystical forces are at play as he trains to become the ultimate martial artist in his quest for revenge.

Source: Crunchyroll

Note: The show premiered worldwide outside of Japan on Crunchyroll & Adult Swim starting from February 6th, ahead of the Japanese broadcast in April.

2022-02-11.name: Kawaru Machi, Kawareru Machi, Ishinomaki. feat. Jun

2022-02-18.name: Fruits Basket: Prelude
2022-02-18.desc: It will depict the past of Kyouko and Katsuya, the parents of Honda Tooru.

2022-02-18.name: Goodbye, Don Glees!
2022-02-18.desc:
The boys, Rouma and Toto, meet when Rouma moves from Tokyo to the countryside, which he cannot grow accustomed to. But when he meets Toto, they become a duo, naming themselves "Don Glees." Eventually, Toto was supposed to move out to Tokyo for school, but on the summer of their first year of high school, they meet Drop, a new addition to Don Glees, who invites them to "view the world from above." When Rouma and Toto follow Drop, they become involved in a forest fire that gets blamed on them, and go off in search of a missing drone that has evidence of their innocence.

Source: ANN

2022-02-22.name: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby (2022)
2022-02-22.desc: A special anime commemorating the first anniversary of the Uma Musume Pretty Derby game's release.

2022-02-25.name: Gekijouban Deemo: Sakura no Oto - Anata no Kanadeta Oto ga, Ima mo Hibiku
2022-02-25.desc:
* Based on a rhythm video game developed by Rayark.

Alone in a castle, a mysterious figure plays a piano... Deemo. One day, a little girl falls from the sky.
A castle littered with mysterious inhabitants, a sacred tree growing by the melody of piano, a girl with no memory, and Deemo.
A gentle story that will touch your heart.

Source: Official website
